room_title: Escape room "Black Beard's Brig" by Great Lakes Escape Game in Flint
room_description: You have been snatched away from the quaint streets of Frankenmuth and are now aboard a ship and held hostage by the pirate Blackbeard. He has gone ashore to pillage and plunder, leaving you to ponder a terrifying end. You have 60 minutes to escape your fate at the hands of his pirates.
